error.no_data: Could get neither measurement nor forecast data for the selected station. Either you selected an invalid station or the station does not provide data.
error.no_station_name: Name of the selected station not found.

user.description:
This integration fetches weather data from the Open Data server of Deutscher Wetterdienst. By using this integration, you agree to the terms at https://opendata.dwd.de/README.txt (German only).

Based on your Home Assistant configuration, the nearest station that should provide measurement and forecast data was preselected below.

If you want to configuare a station manually, select "Custom...".

manual.description:
This integration fetches weather data from the Open Data server of Deutscher Wetterdienst. By using this integration, you agree to the terms at https://opendata.dwd.de/README.txt (German only).

For a list of stations see https://github.com/hg1337/homeassistant-dwd/blob/main/stations.md.

data.current_weather: Which data shall be used as the current weather?
data.forecast: Do you want to have forecast data (recommended)?

options.description: You can change this later in the configuration dialog.

data.current_weather: Which data shall be used as the current weather?
data.forecast: Do you want to have forecast data (recommended)?

options_no_measurement.description:
You can change this later in the configuration dialog.

This station does not provide measurement data, therefore your options are limited. You may still use this station, but real measurement data is usually better.
